Are you presently a registered company limited by shares (or in progress of incorporation) under the Companies Ordinance in HKSAR upon application deadline?

data.name: CCMF_IndComp_2_A
data.value: Are you and all of your project management team members listed in Section 4.1 (a) below between the ages of 18 and 30 upon the application deadline?

data.name: CCMF_IndComp_2_B
data.value: Does your project management team listed in Section 4.1 (a) below consist of 50% of Hong Kong permanent resident(s)?

data.name: CCMF_IndComp_2_C
data.value: Are all the Hong Kong project management team members listed in Section 4.1 below currently enrolled in or have graduated within 3 years from a registered post-secondary education institution in Hong Kong?

data.name: CCMF_IndComp_2_D
data.value: Are all the Shenzhen/Guangdong project management team members listed in Section 4.1 below currently enrolled in or have graduated within 3 years from a registered post-secondary education institution in Shenzhen/Guangdong respectively?

data.name: CCMF_IndComp_2_E
data.value: Is your project rooted in digital tech related areas?

data.name: CCMF_IndComp_2_F
data.value: Have your proposed project or your other similar digital tech project(s) applied for or received any grant or funding from any publicly and/or privately funded organizations/ programmes in the past 18 months? If “Yes”, please list out in details in Section 4.8 below.

data.name: CCMF_IndComp_2_G
data.value: Is your proposed project or your other similar digital tech projects applying for, or does your project or your other similar digital tech project(s) anticipates to receiving or to becoming entitled to receive any grant or funding from any publicly and/or privately-funded organizations or programmes in the coming 18 months? If “Yes”, please list out in details in Section 4.8 below.

data.name: CCMF_IndComp_2_H
data.value: Have your project or your other similar digital tech project(s) applied for the Cyberport Incubation Programme? If “Yes”, please list out in details in Section 4.8 below.

data.name: CCMF_IndComp_2_I
data.value: If you have answered “yes” to Question 2.2.1 (h) above, are you applying for the CCMF using the same or similar project under incubation? If similar or different, please clarify with details in Section 4.10 below to enable our Vetting Team to distinguish this application from any others.

data.name: CCMF_IndComp_2_J
data.value: Are you aware of any existing relationships or situations that might cause the potential for an actual or perceived conflict of interest? If “Yes”, please provide details in Section 4.10 below. Also, please state whether this application is a re-submission of a previously-submitted application to the programme(s) of Cyberport, and / or other publicly-administered funding schemes. If yes, please set out the project reference of the previous application in section 4.10 and highlight the main differences of this application vis-à-vis the previous one.

data.name: HKP_Pro_Stream_Comp_1_A
data.value:
Are you presently a registered company limited by shares (or in progress of incorporation) under the Companies Ordinance in HKSAR upon application deadline?
(Please upload your Certificate of Incorporation (CI) or receipt of application and business registration under Section 6.1.)

data.name: HKP_Pro_Stream_Comp_1_B
data.value: If not, do you agree to set up a company registered as a legal entity and incorporated in Hong Kong upon admission to the Cyberport Creative Micro fund?

data.name: HKP_Pro_Stream_IndComp_2_A
data.value: Is your project rooted in digital tech related areas?

data.name: HKP_Pro_Stream_IndComp_2_B
data.value: Have you and your core team members, proposed project or your other similar digital tech project(s) or other tech related projects applied for or received any grant or funding from any publicly and/or privately funded organisations/ programmes in the past 18 months? If “Yes”, please list out in details in Section 4.8 below.

data.name: HKP_Pro_Stream_IndComp_2_C
data.value: Have you and your core team members, your proposed project or your other similar digital tech projects or other tech related projects applying for, or does your project or your other similar digital tech project(s) anticipates to receiving or to becoming entitled to receive any grant or funding from any publicly and/or privately-funded organisations or programmes in the coming 18 months? If “Yes”, please list out in details in Section 4.8 below.

data.name: HKP_Pro_Stream_IndComp_2_D
data.value: Have you and your project team members, your project or your other similar digital tech project(s) applied for the Cyberport Incubation Programme? If “Yes”, please list out in details in Section 4.8 below

data.name: HKP_Pro_Stream_IndComp_2_E
data.value: If you have answered “yes” to Question 2.1.1 (d) above, are you applying for the CCMF using the same or similar project under incubation? If similar or different, please clarify with details in Section 4.10 below to enable our Vetting Team to distinguish this application from any others.</br></br>Remark: If an applicant of the same project applying for Cyberport Creative Micro Fund (CCMF) and Cyberport Incubation Programme (CIP) at the same intake, HKCMCL shall only consider the application of CIP without further notice.

data.name: HKP_Pro_Stream_IndComp_2_F
data.value: Are you aware of any existing relationships or situations that might cause the potential for an actual or perceived conflict of interest? If “Yes”, please provide details in Section 4.10 below.

data.name: HKP_Pro_Stream_IndComp_2_F_1
data.value: Please state whether this application is a re-submission of a previously-submitted application to the programme(s) of Cyberport, and / or other publicly-administered funding schemes. If yes, please set out the project reference of the previous application in section 4.10 and highlight the main differences of this application vis-à-vis the previous one.

data.name: HKP_Pro_Stream_IndComp_2_F_note
data.value:
Note: Applicant should make a true, full and accurate disclosure on information requested. The application can be treated as an ineligible application if applicant violates the rule of application. Cyberport has the absolute right to terminate the admitted project due to violation on CCMF rules while applying and within CCMF project period.

If an applicant of the same project applying for Cyberport Creative Micro Fund (CCMF) and Cyberport Incubation Programme (CIP) at the same intake, HKCMCL shall only consider the application of CIP without further notice. Application eligibility of CCMF is stated in the Guides and Notes for Applicants – CCMF Greater Bay Area Young EntrepreneurshipProgramme.

data.name: HKP_Pro_Stream_Ind_1_A
data.value: Are you at or above 18 years old?
data.comment: Are you and all of your project management team members listed in Section 4.1 below between the ages of 18 to 30 upon the application deadline?

data.name: HKP_Pro_Stream_Ind_1_B
data.value: Are you a Hong Kong ID Card holder(s)?

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_Comp_1_A
data.value:
Are you presently a registered company limited by shares (or in progress of incorporation) under the Companies Ordinance in HKSAR upon application deadline?
(Please upload your Certificate of Incorporation (CI) or receipt of application and business registration under Section 6.1.)

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_Comp_1_B
data.value: If not, do you agree to set up a company registered as a legal entity and incorporated in Hong Kong upon admission to the Cyberport Creative Micro fund?

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_Comp_1_C
data.value: Are you and all of your project management team members/owners of the company listed in Section 4.1 below between the ages of 18 and 30 upon the application deadline?
data.comment: Is there at least one of the company founders listed in Section 4.1 at the age between 18 to 35?

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_Comp_1_C_note
data.value:
Note: The founder or at least one of the founders listed in Section 4.1 below must be aged between 18 and 30 to qualify applying HKYEP of the CCMF Hong Kong Programme.

The designated founder/ co-founder fulfilling the application eligibility must play the same position in the company and project team while applying, admitting and during the 6-month project period after admission.

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_Comp_2_D
data.value: Have you and your core team member(s), your proposed project or other similar digital tech or other digital tech related project(s) applied for the Cyberport Incubation Programme? If “Yes”, please list out in details in Section 4.8 below.

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_Comp_2_E
data.value: If you have answered “yes” to Question 2.1.1 (d) above, are you applying for the CCMF using the same or similar project under incubation? If similar or different, please clarify with details in Section 4.10 below to enable our Vetting Team to distinguish this application from any others.

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_Comp_2_F
data.value: Are you aware of any existing relationships or situations that might cause the potential for an actual or perceived conflict of interest? If “Yes”, please provide details in Section 4.10 below. Also, please state whether this application is a re-submission of a previously-submitted application to the programme(s) of Cyberport, and / or other publicly-administered funding schemes. If yes, please set out the project reference of the previous application in section 4.10 and highlight the main differences of this application vis-à-vis the previous one.

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_Comp_2_F_Note
data.value:
Note: Applicant should make a true, full and accurate disclosure on information requested. The application can be treated as an ineligible application if applicant violates the rule of application. Cyberport has the absolute right to terminate the admitted project due to violation on CCMF rules while applying and within CCMF project period.

If an applicant of the same project applying for Cyberport Creative Micro Fund (CCMF) and Cyberport Incubation Programme (CIP) at the same intake, HKCMCL shall only consider the application of CIP without further notice.

Application eligibility of CCMF is stated in the Guides and Notes for Applicants – CCMF Greater Bay Area Young EntrepreneurshipProgramme.

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_IndComp_2_A
data.value: Are you and all of your project management team members listed in Section 4.1 (a) below (if any) between the ages of 18 and 30 upon the application deadline?

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_IndComp_2_B
data.value: Are you and all of your project management team members listed in Section 4.1 (a) below (if any) currently enrolled in or have graduated within 3 years from a registered post-secondary education institution in Hong Kong?

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_IndComp_2_C
data.value: Is your project rooted in digital tech related areas?

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_IndComp_2_D
data.value: Have you and the core team members, your proposed project or your other similar digital tech project(s) or other tech related projects applied for or received any grant or funding from any publicly and/or privately funded organisations/ programmes in the past 18 months? If “Yes”, please list out in details in Section 4.8 below.

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_IndComp_2_E
data.value: Have you and the core team members, your proposed project or your other similar digital tech projects or other tech related projects applying for, or does your project or your other similar digital tech project(s) anticipates to receiving or to becoming entitled to receive any grant or funding from any publicly and/or privately-funded organisations or programmes in the coming 18 months? If “Yes”, please list out in details in Section 4.8 below.

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_IndComp_2_F
data.value: Have you and the core team members, your project or your other similar digital tech project(s) applied for the Cyberport Incubation Programme? If “Yes”, please list out in details in Section 4.8 below.

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_IndComp_2_F_1
data.value: Please state whether this application is a re-submission of a previously-submitted application to the programme(s) of Cyberport, and / or other publicly-administered funding schemes. If yes, please set out the project reference of the previous application in section 4.10 and highlight the main differences of this application vis-à-vis the previous one.

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_IndComp_2_G
data.value: If you have answered “yes” to Question 2.1.2 (d) above, are you applying for the CCMF using the same or similar project under incubation? If similar or different, please clarify with details in Section 4.10 below to enable our Vetting Team to distinguish this application from any others.

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_IndComp_2_H
data.value: Are you aware of any existing relationships or situations that might cause the potential for an actual or perceived conflict of interest? If “Yes”, please provide details in Section 4.10 below

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_Ind_1_A
data.value: Are you and all of your project management team members listed in Section 4.1 below between the ages of 18 to 30 upon the application deadline?

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_Ind_1_B
data.value: Are you a Hong Kong ID Card holder(s)?

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_Ind_1_C
data.value: Are you/ Is the principal applicant of the application listed in Section 4.1 below between the ages of 18 and 30?

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_Ind_1_C_note
data.value: Note: The principal applicant of Individual Application of HKYEP of CCMF Hong Kong Programme must be aged between 18 and 30

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_Ind_2_D
data.value: Have you and your core team member(s), your proposed project or other similar digital tech or other digital tech related project(s) applied for the Cyberport Incubation Programme? If “Yes”, please list out in details in Section 4.8 below.

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_Ind_2_E
data.value: If you have answered “yes” to Question 2.1.1 (d) above, are you applying for the CCMF using the same or similar project under incubation? If similar or different, please clarify with details in Section 4.10 below to enable our Vetting Team to distinguish this application from any others.

data.name: HKP_Pro_Young_Ind_2_F
data.value: Are you aware of any existing relationships or situations that might cause the potential for an actual or perceived conflict of interest? If “Yes”, please provide details in Section 4.10 below. Also, please state whether this application is a re-submission of a previously-submitted application to the programme(s) of Cyberport, and / or other publicly-administered funding schemes. If yes, please set out the project reference of the previous application in section 4.10 and highlight the main differences of this application vis-à-vis the previous one.

data.value: Cyberport Creative Micro Fund

data.value: CCMF Hong Kong Young Entrepreneur Programme

data.value: CCMF Hong Kong Young Entrepreneur Programme

data.name: ID_Passport_Format
data.value: (For HKID holder please input full ID no. e.g.A123456(1). For Passport No., input the full number)

data.name: Individual_and_Company_Applicant
data.value: Individual and Company Applicant

data.name: Individual_Applicant
data.value: Individual Applicant

data.name: Individual_Application
data.value: Individual Application

data.name: Instruction_0
data.value: You are required:

data.name: Instruction_1
data.value: To observe the following requirements when filling in the application:

data.name: Instruction_1_1
data.value: Use <mark>English</mark> to complete the application unless otherwise specified;

data.name: Instruction_1_2
data.value: Present all monetary figures in <mark>Hong Kong Dollar;</mark>

data.name: Instruction_1_3
data.value: Use <mark>Traditional Chinese characters</mark> for Chinese information;

data.name: Instruction_1_4
data.value: Put <mark>“NA”</mark> where the information sought is not applicable or not available;

data.name: Instruction_2
data.value: To read the Guides and Notes for Applicants – CCMF Greater Bay Area Young EntrepreneurshipProgramme (ENC.RF.015b) before filling in this Application Form, especially part 1, 2 and 3.

data.name: Instruction_3
data.value: The form must be completed by the applicant. If the applicant is a company, the form must be completed by the director or owner of the applicant organisation. Otherwise it will not be processed.

data.name: Instruction_4
data.value: <mark class="mark-2">ONE email address for EACH CCMF Programme application</mark>, and that email address would receive all the emails in respect of the submitted application. If you have another project to apply for CCMF Programme, please use a separate email address for that application.

data.name: Instruction_4_1
data.value:
Please prepare and upload the requested supporting documents in Section 6 including, but not limited to, the following:

  • Company documents (e.g. Business Registration, Certificate of Incorporation, Company Ownership document,etc.) (if applicable)
  • Identity documents (e.g. copy of Hong Kong Identity Card, Passport, etc.) (if applicable))
  • Other supplementary information such as Corporate Structure / Organisation Chart, Curriculum Vitae of team members, pictures, diagrams and business proposal, etc. for illustration of your project (if any)
  • You are recommended to prepare a 1-minute video clip/presentation file/slide show to illustrate your project. Kindly provide the link if there is any.

data.name: Instruction_5
data.value: For enquiries, please email to <mark class="mark-2">ccmf_enquiry@cyberport.hk</mark>.

data.name: Instruction_7
data.value: Remarks: This application form has been translated into Chinese for reference only. In case of discrepancy, the English version shall prevail.

data.name: Instruction_8
data.value: Hong Kong Cyberport Management Company Limited

data.name: CompanyDocument
data.value: Company Documents (if applicable)

data.name: OtherAttachment
data.value: Other supplementary information, e.g., business plan (if any)

data.name: PresentationSlide
data.value: Presentation Slide

data.name: Professional_Stream
data.value: CCMF Professional Programme

data.name: Remarks
data.value: Remarks

data.name: Ste3_BusinessAreasub
data.value: (Please choose one closest to your nature)

data.name: Step1_CCMF_3
data.value: f

data.name: Step1_CCMF_3_note
data.value:
(If yes: please show up the message and does not allow the applicant to submit the application)

CCMF sponsors high potential digital tech start-up projects and business ideas with a HK$100,000 grant to develop a prototype/ MVP of the idea for proof of concept (POC).

If the project currently has developed the prototype/ MVP or launched to testers/ market, you may NOT eligible to apply CCMF. For enquiry: ccmf_enquiry@cyberport.hk

Interested party to apply Cyberport Incubation Programme, please visitHERE.

data.name: Step1_CCMF_Selection
data.value: Please choose one of the types of CCMF below:

data.name: Step1_Note
data.value:
Note: The principal applicant of Individual Application must be permanent HKID card holder. Otherwise, please consider submit application as Company Application.
Application eligibility of CCMF is stated in the Guides and Notes for Applicants – CCMF Greater Bay Area Young EntrepreneurshipProgramme.

data.name: Step1_Question1_3
data.value: Is your project applying CCMF exceeded/not in the early-stage development, for example: launched and generated sustainable revenue, or planning/ going to plan overseas marketing expansion?

data.value: TYPES OF CCMF

data.name: Step2_Heading
data.value: YOUR PROFILE AND ELIGIBILITY

data.name: Step2_Note
data.value:
Note: Applicants should make a true, full and accurate disclosure on information requested. The application can be treated as an ineligible application if applicant violates the rule of application. Cyberport has the absolute right to terminate the admitted project due to violation on CCMF rules while applying and within CCMF project period after admission.

If an applicant of the same project applying for Cyberport Creative Micro Fund (CCMF) and Cyberport Incubation Programme (CIP) at the same intake, HKCMCL shall only consider the application of CIP without further notice.

Application eligibility of CCMF Hong Kong Programme is stated in the Guides and Notes for Applicants – CCMF Greater Bay Area Young EntrepreneurshipProgramme.

data.value: Preference will be given to projects that incorporate social responsibility objectives as a project focus (including contribution to open source, creative commons and other “progressive” technologies with a social focus), demonstration of ethical decision making, or contribution towards solving problems that originate from the social environment.

data.name: Step_5_Notice

data.name: Step_6_Access
data.value: Access to and Correction of Your Data

data.name: Step_6_Access_1
data.value: You have the right to request access to, and correction of, Your Data held by us. We may charge a reasonable fee for administering and processing your data access request. If you need to check whether we hold Your Data or if you wish to have access to, correct any of Your Data which is inaccurate, please write via e-mail to our Data Protection Officer at dpo@cyberport.hk or via mail to Level 6, Cyberport 2, 100 Cyberport Road, Hong Kong.

data.name: Step_6_Consideration
data.value: In consideration of Hong Kong Cyberport Management Company Limited (“HKCMCL”) considering and processing our application for funding from CCMF, we confirm our agreement and undertake the following by checking this box

data.name: Step_6_Consideration_1
data.value: We agree with all the terms and conditions set out in the Guides and Notes for Applicants – CCMF Greater Bay Area Young EntrepreneurshipProgramme (ENC.RF.015b) governing the application of the Cyberport Creative Micro Fund Scheme.

data.name: Step_6_Consideration_2
data.value: All information provided in this application as well as the accompanying information is true, not misleading in any manner and reflects the status of affairs as at the date of submission. I shall inform the Administration of the Cyberport Creative Micro Fund immediately if there are any changes to the above information.

data.name: Step_6_Consideration_3
data.value: We are the creators of our proposed project the details of which have been described in Section 3 of this CCMF Application Form ("Project") and our Project is original. To the best of our knowledge, the Project and the product(s) and/or service(s) to be developed as a part of the Project are not under development or available anywhere in the world.

data.name: Step_6_Consideration_4
data.value: The development, completion and use of the Project and the product(s) and/or service(s) to be developed as a part of the Project will not infringe the rights or intellectual property rights of any other party (whether registered or not), including but not limited to patent rights, trade mark rights, and copyright.

data.name: Step_6_Consideration_5
data.value: Other than the funding programme(s) specified in Section 4.8 of this Application Form, we (whether individually or as part of any team) have not applied for or received any other grant or funding from any publicly and/or privately funded organisations/programmes for the Project in the past 18 months and we are not applying for nor will we be entitled to receive any other grant or funding from any publicly and/or privately funded organisations/programmes for the Project in the future 18 months. We will notify Cyberport immediately if we apply for or become entitled to any grant or funding from any publicly and/or privately funded organisations/programmes for the Project and when requested, provide evidence of payments made or received in respect of such programmes.

data.name: Step_6_Consideration_6
data.value: We will use any grant to be received from the CCMF (if any) for the sole purpose of developing and completing the Project. We will not give away, share or othen/vise use any grant to be received from the CCMF in contravention of the law or any of the terms which apply to application for funding from the CCMF.

data.name: Step_6_Consideration_7
data.value: We understand the information provided in this application will be disclosed to authorised Cyberport staff and vetting team for screening and vetting purposes. No Confidential Agreement of any kind will be signed with Cyberport or the authorised Cyberport staff and vetting members on any occasion.

data.name: Step_6_Consideration_8
data.value: We give our consent to authorised Cyberport staff to carry out necessary due diligence/reference check for the purpose of assessing this application.

data.name: Step_6_Consideration_9
data.value: We acknowledge that HKCMCL has absolute discretion to revoke this application and call for refund of the full amount of grant received by the applicant if any member of the team breaches any of the terms and conditions in the Guides and Notes for Applicants – CCMF Greater Bay Area Young EntrepreneurshipProgramme (ENC.RF.015b), this CCMF Application Form and any other relevant agreement(s) between us and HKCMCL. If any of our conduct amounts to or may amount to a breach of criminal law, HKCMCL would report our conduct to the relevant law enforcement body.

data.name: Step_6_cyberport
data.value: “Cyberport”

data.name: Step_6_cyberport_1
data.value: means the community or development located at Telegraph Bay, Pokfulam including its offices, centres and arcade.

data.name: Step_6_cyberport_2
data.value: We cannot use Your Data for direct marketing unless we have received your consent or indication of no objection. You may write to our Data Protection Officer or contact us via the contact information provided in our direct marketing materials to opt out from direct marketing at any time.

data.name: Step_6_DECLARATION
data.value: DECLARATION

data.name: Step_6_Direct_marketing
data.value: Direct Marketing

data.name: Step_6_Direct_marketing_1
data.value: In connection with direct marketing, we intend to use your name and email address to market and promote the services, products, facilities, activities, contests, conferences, lucky draws, events and promotional campaigns from time to time available relating to us or "Cyberport", or shops or merchants or hotel in the "Cyberport" or offered or hosted at "Cyberport" (including consumer goods, food and beverages, books and stationery, children goods and services, fashion and accessories, optical products, watches, jewellery, luxurious goods, personal care, health and beauty products and services, furniture and lifestyle goods, home furnishing and appliances, florists, sports gear and products, electronic products and appliances, banking and financial services, cinemas and theatres, cultural, entertainment facilities and activities, charity activities, leisure activities and performances, gift redemptions and car parking facilities)

data.name: Step_6_Full_Name
data.value: Full Name of Principal Applicant

data.name: Step_6_Full_Name_2
data.value: Full Name of 2nd Principal Applicant

data.name: Step_6_2nd_Email
data.value: Email of 2nd Principal Applicant

data.name: step_6_marketing
data.value: I agree to receive direct marketing information.

data.name: Step_6_PERSONAL_INFORMATION
data.value: PERSONAL INFORMATION COLLECTION STATEMENT

data.name: Step_6_PERSONAL_INFORMATION_1
data.value: This Personal Information Collection Statement of Hong Kong Cyberport Management Company Limited ("us" or "we") applies to the personal data collected in this CCMF Application Form ("Personal Data").

data.name: step_6_personal_information_collection
data.value: l have read the Personal Information Collection Statement above.

data.name: Step_6_Privacy
data.value: Our Privacy Policy and Practices

data.name: Step_6_Privacy_1
data.value: Please see our Privacy Policy Statement at

data.name: Step_6_Privacy_2
data.value: Please see our Privacy Policy Statement at http://www.cyberport.hk/en/privacy_policy for our general policy and practices in respect of our collection and use of personal data.

data.name: Step_6_Purpose
data.value: Purpose and Use of Your Data

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_1
data.value: The Personal Data will be used for one or more of the following purposes:

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_2
data.value: processing your application;

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_3
data.value: communicating with you if we have any/or question and update about your application;

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_4
data.value: providing updates, services, products, facilities or activities and matters relating to our administration, management, operation and maintenance;

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_5
data.value: designing, reviewing, evaluating and enhancing our services, products, facilities or activities (including conducting research, survey and analysis for those purposes);

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_6
data.value: direct marketing (please see "Direct Marketing" section below); and

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_7
data.value: handling complaints, legal, safety and security purposes.

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_8
data.value: It is mandatory to provide the requested personal data, or we will not be able to process your application.

data.name: STEP_6_STATEMENT
data.value: This Statement is written in the English language and may be translated into other languages. In the event of any inconsistency between the English version and the translated version of this Statement, the English version shall prevail.

data.name: Step_6_Title_Principal_Applicant
data.value: Position Title of Principal Applicant

data.name: Step_6_Title_2nd_Applicant
data.value: Position Title of 2nd Principal Applicant

data.name: Step_6_Transfer_data
data.value: Transfer of Your Data

data.name: Step_6_Transfer_data_1
data.value: Your Data will not generally be disclosed or transferred to any other party in a form that would identify you, except in the following circumstances:

data.name: Step_6_Transfer_data_2
data.value: If we use third party suppliers or service providers who provide services to support our business operation or facilitate provision of our services, products, facilities or activities, we may provide Your Data to these suppliers or service providers.

data.name: Step_6_Transfer_data_3
data.value: We may disclose Your Data to any governmental or law enforcement agency, judicial body or regulatory authority to whom we are required to make disclosure according to any law, regulation, court order, direction, code or guideline.

data.name: Step_6_Transfer_data_4
data.value: In addition, Your Data may be accessed by, disclosed or transferred to any person under a duty of confidentiality to us (including our accountants, auditors, legal advisers or other professional advisers) for the purposes described in the "Purpose and Use of Your Data" section above.

data.name: Step_6_Transfer_data_note
data.value: As the parties mentioned above may be located outside Hong Kong, Your Data may be transferred out of Hong Kong.

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_Ind_1_A
data.value: Does the Hong Kong Team Leader listed in Section 4.1 below a Hong Kong ID Card holder and Macau/Guangdong Team Leader listed in Section 4.1 below is Macau/China PRC ID Card holder?

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_Comp_1_A
data.value: Do you presently have a company registered as a legal entity and incorporated in Hong Kong?

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_Comp_1_B
data.value: If not, do you agree to set up a company registered as a legal entity and incorporated in Hong Kong upon admission to the Cyberport Creative Micro fund?

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_IndComp_2_C
data.value: Did you and all of your project management team members listed in Section 4.1 below attend and complete the entrepreneurship bootcamp?

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_IndComp_2_D
data.value: Are you and all of your project management team members listed in Section 4.1 below between the ages of 18 and 30 upon the application deadline?

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_IndComp_2_E
data.value: Does your project management team listed in Section 4.1 below consist of 50% of Hong Kong resident(s)?

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_IndComp_2_F
data.value: Are all the Hong Kong project management team members listed in Section 4.1 below currently enrolled in or have graduated within 3 years from a registered post-secondary education institution in Hong Kong/Macau/Guangdong region?

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_IndComp_2_G
data.value: Are all the Guangdong/Macau project management team members listed in Section 4.1 below currently enrolled in or have graduated within 3 years from a registered post-secondary education institution in Guangdong/Macau respectively?

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_IndComp_2_H
data.value: Is your project rooted in digital tech related areas?

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_IndComp_2_I
data.value: Have your proposed project or your other similar digital tech project(s) applied for or received any grant or funding from any publicly and/or privately funded organisations/ programmes in the past 18 months? If “Yes”, please list out in details in Section 4.8 below.

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_IndComp_2_J
data.value: Is your proposed project or your other similar digital tech projects applying for, or does your project or your other similar digital tech project(s) anticipates to receiving or to becoming entitled to receive any grant or funding from any publicly and/or privately-funded organisations or programmes in the coming 18 months? If “Yes”, please list out in details in Section 4.8 below.

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_IndComp_2_K
data.value: Have your project or your other similar digital tech project(s) applied for the Cyberport Incubation Programme? If “Yes”, please list out in details in Section 4.8 below.

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_IndComp_2_L
data.value: If you have answered “yes” to Question 2.2 (j) above, are you applying for the CCMF using the same or similar project under incubation? If similar or different, please clarify with details in Section 4.10 below to enable our Vetting Team to distinguish this application from any others.

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_IndComp_2_M
data.value: Are you aware of any existing relationships or situations that might cause the potential for an actual or perceived conflict of interest? If “Yes”, please provide details in Section 4.10 below.

data.name: CCMFGBAYEP_IndComp_2_N
data.value: Please state whether this application is a re-submission of a previously-submitted application to the programme(s) of Cyberport, and / or other publicly-administered funding schemes. If yes, please set out the project reference of the previous application in Section 4.10 and highlight the main differences of this application vis-à-vis the previous one.

data.name: String1
data.value: We acknowledge that HKCMCL has absolute discretion

data.name: StudentID
data.value: Student ID or Graduation Certificate

data.name: VideoClip
data.value: Video Clip
